1376790.name: Pyramid Runner
1376790.description:
This arcade puzzle game challenges you to collect treasures from ancient pyramids, dark dungeons, and even Mars. You'll have to outsmart cruel mummies and dangerous gorillas, as well as solve many of clever puzzles.

In one of the pyramids you found an ancient artifact - a digging stick. With it you can destroy brick blocks in the floor. Through these holes you can enter inaccessible areas with gold bars. You need to collect all the gold bars to complete the level.

If an enemy falls into a hole you dig, they will be stuck in it for a while. You can run across this hole over his head. Over time, the dug holes are restored, burying everyone who is in them.

Features:

  • Two game worlds. For novices and experienced players.
  • Custom game worlds from the Steam Workshop.
  • Each level has an online leaderboard. The faster you complete a level, the higher your position on the leaderboard.
  • Install the Level Editor and create your original levels. Share them for other players to enjoy.
1376790.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
